title: Prospera Execution Adapter Output
description: Canonical output contract emitted by the Prospera Execution Adapter.

execution_status.description: Final adapter decision for downstream execution.

execution_payload.description: Normalized, execution-ready payload. Present only when execution_status is EXECUTION_READY.

rejection_reason.description: Canonical rejection reason. Present only when execution_status is EXECUTION_REJECTED.

metadata.description: Adapter metadata for audit, traceability, and version control.

adapter_version.description: Version of the execution adapter implementation.

generation_schema_version.description: Version of the generation schema validated by the adapter.

execution_schema_version.description: Version of the execution schema targeted by the adapter.
